humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has cancer metastases in 1 out of 13 assessed axillary lymph nodes (1/13). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient was found to have cancer metastases in 1 out of 13 axillary lymph nodes (1/13) according to the pathology report. This indicates that the cancer has spread to the lymph nodes, which is classified as N1 stage. The specific N1 subcategory (N1a) is also mentioned in the report. The T and M stages cannot be determined solely based on this report, so only the N stage is provided.
